fromHistoricalRevision.description: The revision to start the streaming from. May also be negative in order to specify to get the last n revisions relative to the 'toHistoricalRevision'.

toHistoricalRevision.description: The revision to stop the streaming at. May also be 0 or negative in order to specify to get either the latest (0) or the nth most recent revision.

fromHistoricalTimestamp.description: The timestamp to start the streaming from.

toHistoricalTimestamp.description: The timestamp to stop the streaming at.

filter.description: An RQL expression defining which events to filter for in the stream. Only supported for thing events.
